arts.ttl: Inter Milan Captain Climbs Argentina All Time Top Scorers List With Brace Vs Puerto Rico
arts.sum: Inter Milan superstar Lautaro Martinez scored twice off the bench as Argentina trounced Puerto Rico 6-0 in last night’s friendly. According to FCInter1908, the 28-year-old became La Albiceleste’s fourth all-time leading goalscorer with that brace. Despite earlier claims that Lionel Scaloni could rest Lautaro Martinez, El Toro entered the field in the second half. arts.ttl: Argentina Player Ratings: Messi Masterclass in 6-0 Rout of Puerto Rico
arts.sum: Lionel Messi delivered a masterful performance with two assists, guiding the reigning world champions Argentina to a resounding 6-0 victory over Puerto Rico in a relocated friendly on Tuesday night. The match, originally scheduled for Chicago, was instead played at Chase Stadium, the home of Messi’s Inter Miami. arts.ttl: Messi sets up 2 as Argentina trounce Puerto Rico
arts.sum: Lionel Messi had two assists and helped start a play that led to another goal, as reigning World Cup champion Argentina beat Puerto Rico 6-0 in a relocated international friendly on Tuesday night.

arts.ttl: Messi gets two assists, Argentina beats Puerto Rico 6-0 in relocated soccer friendly
arts.sum: Lionel Messi had two assists and helped start a play that led to another goal, as reigning World Cup champion Argentina beat Puerto Rico 6-0 in a relocated international friendly on Tuesday night. Playing on the field he calls home with Inter Miami in Major League Soccer, Messi flicked a quick lob to set up Gonzalo Montiel’s score in the first half and then had a nifty back pass that created Lautaro Martínez’s second goal of the night in the 83rd minute.

arts.ttl: Inter Milan Superstar To Be Rested In Puerto Rico Vs Argentina Friendly
arts.sum: Argentina head coach Lionel Scaloni will reportedly rest Inter Milan captain Lautaro Martinez in tonight’s international friendly against Puerto Rico. According to TNT Sports Argentina via FCInterNews, El Toro will start the game on the bench.
